trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The capybara has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The capybara has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the capybara's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: +1 Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +8} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
entries: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The sidekick's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

trait.name: Extra Attack
entries: The sidekick can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
entries: The sidekick has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Improved Defence.
entries: The sidekick's Armor Class increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable
entries: The sidekick can reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new roll. When it uses this feature, it can't use the feature again until it finishes a long rest.
The sidekick can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 18th level.

bonus.name: Second Wind
entries: The sidekick can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + its level in this class. Once it uses this feature, it must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.

bonus.name: The Righteous Sadism
entries: This character, under the influense of Hells, becomes more resentful, which fuels them in battle. When it hits an evil creature with a weapon attack, it can spend a bonus action to add {@dice 1d10} damage. At the end of the battle it must succeed on a {@dc 5} + the amount of times it used this ability Wisdom Saving Throw or change it's allignment to neutral if it's current allignment is good and evil if it was neutral.
Affected creature can repeat this saving throw with the same difficulty during a long rest. Character that have a spiritual connection with a god of a good allignment roll this check with advantage.
Becomes more and more sadistic due to the influense of Hell

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: The Demon Grinder can move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. When it does, the creature must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the creature was already {@condition prone}, it takes an extra 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage. This trait can't be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Demon Grinder's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Demon Grinder rolls over and falls {@condition prone}, it can't right itself and is {@condition incapacitated} until flipped upright.

trait.name: Infernal Adamantium Alloy Pistons
entries: Dexterity of the Demon Grinder is increased by two and speed is increased by 25.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Demon Grinder.

actionStation.name: Better Chomper (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 8d8 + 8}) piercing damage. A target reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ground to bits and spit out through pipes on both sides of the Demon Grinder. Any nonmagical items the target was holding or carrying are destroyed as well.

actionStation.name: Wrecking Ball (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}40 ({@damage 8d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Double the damage if the target is an object or a structure.

actionStation.name: 2 Harpoon Flingers (Each Station Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: The Tormentor can move through the space of any Medium or smaller creature. When it does, the creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.If the creature was already {@condition prone}, it takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage.This trait can't be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Tormentor rolls over and falls {@condition prone}, it can't right itself and is {@condition incapacitated} until flipped upright.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Tormentor's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Raking Scythes
entries: When the Tormentor moves within 5 feet of a creature that isn't {@condition prone} or another vehicle for the first time on a turn, it can rake the creature or vehicle with its protruding blades for 13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) slashing damage. A creature moves out of the way and takes no damage if it succeeds on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw.A vehicle moves out of the way and takes no damage if its driver succeeds on the saving throw.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Tormentor

actionStation.name: Infernal Screamer (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: The screamer's operator targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of the screamer. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw, taking 26 ({@damage 4d12}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: If the Tormentor is able to move, the driver can use its reaction to grant the Tormentor advantage on a Dexterity saving throw.
